eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Shape
      • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Note

  • public class Note
extends Shape
    Class Note provides methods to add a note with the given size and given location, modifies the text of the note, and modifying the size and location.
